test.create_query: CREATE TABLE perf_lc_fixed_str_groupby( a LowCardinality(FixedString(14)), b LowCardinality(FixedString(14)) ) ENGINE MergeTree ORDER BY tuple()
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO perf_lc_fixed_str_groupby SELECT ('number key ' || toString(number % 400)) AS a, ('number key ' || toString(number % 20)) AS b FROM numbers(30000000)
test.query: SELECT count() FROM perf_lc_fixed_str_groupby GROUP BY a
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc_fixed_str_groupby GROUP BY b
